DescriptionAbout 11:59We are 11:59, a professional services firm that helps forward-thinking public and commercial sector clients unlock the full potential of their transformation and modernization efforts. With a team led by former Big 4 Consulting Executives, we bring the Art of the Possible to life, delivering unbiased strategies that are independent from resource constraints, while generating true value and advantage based on what is possible today so that our clients are ready for tomorrow.As a firm that’s built on the curiosity of our experts, we employ an integrated, agile talent model to deliver modern technology. Our clients hire us for our shared commitment to their mission, the collaborative approach of our team members, and our track record of delivering breakthrough solutions and results.At 11:59, we don’t just showcase the art of the possible, we deliver it.Summary: The Cognitive AI Service Line Leader is responsible for leading 11:59’s Ai practice, which provides consulting services to clients on a wide range of AI-related topics. The Practice Leader will utilize their experience in Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning (AI/ML), AWS, Azure, and Cloud Computing to build, lead and grow the 11:59 AI Service Line. The Cognitive AI Service Line Leader will have experience building, selling, and leading an AI practice and is responsible for developing and executing the practice's growth strategy, building, and managing a team of AI consultants, and delivering high-quality AI solutions to clients.Responsibilities: Develop and execute the Cognitive AI Service Line growth strategy, including identifying new markets, developing new offerings, and building relationships with potential clients Build and manage a team of AI consultants, including hiring, performance management, and professional developmentWork with clients to define their AI vision and goals and develop and implement AI solutions that meet their needsDevelop effective alliance programs, leveraging our existing AWS Partnership and work with alliance partners on joint solutioning and go-to-market programs Stay up to date on the latest AI trends and technologies and ensure that the practice is using the most cutting-edge AI solutionsRepresent the practice to clients, partners, and the public, and build relationships with key stakeholdersAct as a trusted advisor to senior executives and stakeholders, offering expert guidance on AI-related decisions Foster a data-driven mindset within organizations and promote the adoption of AI across various departmentsLead and contribute aspects of AI/ML to Technology proposals and lead and identify new growth areas for AI/ML in net new clientsDefine project scopes, timelines, and deliverables Qualifications: Master's degree in computer science, data science, or a related field 10+ years of experience in management & technology consulting 7+ years of experience in the field of AI, with experience in consulting or other professional services settingProven experience in developing and leading an AI Practice to include all staff, hiring, mentoring, training, sales and go to market experienceExperience in developing new service offerings and go-to-market strategy & executionExcellent communication and presentation skillsAI/ML architecture, development and solution architecture experience preferably with AWS and Azure cognitive servicesCompensation: Competitive salary $180K-$240K Performance bonus 401(k) with company match Medical, dental, and vision insurance Paid time off Applicants must be able to work in the United States without the need for current or future visa sponsorship. No Corp to Corp.Salary Description$180,000-$240,000
